types:type.name: datosCSV
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type datosCSV = Array<{| customerId: Number, customerName: String, salesOrderNumber: Number, itemNumber: Number, quantity: String, "type": String, price: Number, itemDescription: String |}> {"MetadataFormat": "csv"}

types:type.name: datosJSON
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type datosJSON = {| customerId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, customerName: String, items: Array<{| itemDescription: String, itemNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, quantity: Number {"typeId": "int"}, "type": String |}>, salesOrderNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"customerId\":1,\"customerName\":\"Adan Rosales\",\"items\":[{\"itemDescription\":\"it\u00B4s a doll\",\"itemNumber\":15215,\"price\":12,\"quantity\":3,\"type\":\"item\"},{\"itemDescription\":\"Internet\",\"itemNumber\":221,\"price\":133,\"quantity\":2,\"type\":\"service\"}],\"salesOrderNumber\":1000}"}

types:type.name: Json_to_json
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type Json_to_json = Array<{| customerId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, customerName: String, salesOrderNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, itemNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, quantity: Number {"typeId": "int"}, "type": String, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, itemDescription: String |}> {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "[{\"customerId\":2,\"customerName\":\"Lyndis\",\"salesOrderNumber\":21331,\"itemNumber\":15234,\"quantity\":3,\"type\":\"item\",\"price\":23,\"itemDescription\":\"zolar\"},{\"customerId\":2,\"customerName\":\"Lyndis\",\"salesOrderNumber\":21331,\"itemNumber\":234,\"quantity\":1,\"type\":\"service\",\"price\":12,\"itemDescription\":\"water\"}]"}

types:type.name: csv
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type csv = {| customerName: String, iditems: Number {"typeId": "int"}, itemDescription: String, salesOrderNumber: String |} {"example": "{\"customerName\":\"Lyndis\",\"iditems\":40,\"itemDescription\":\"water\",\"salesOrderNumber\":\"21331\"}"}
